book.synopsis: Paulsen and his team of dogs endured snowstorms, frostbite, dogfights, moose attacks, sleeplessness, and hallucinations in the relentless push to go on. Map and color photographs.
book.title_long: Winterdance: The Fine Madness of Running the Iditarod
